为什么Mānuka不再是新西兰唯一的治愈蜂蜜奥克兰技术大学的新研究表明，八家新西兰原始的蜂蜜（Mānuka）超越了麦努卡（Mānuka），具有独特的抗氧化剂，抗菌和生物活性特性。百里香和山毛榉蜜菜因其维生素C和多酚含量而脱颖而出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/why-manuka-isnt-the-healing-healing-honeing-from-new-new-zealand-anymore.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/why-manuka-isnt-the-healing-healing-honeing-honey-from-new-new--zealand-anymore.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=960600AA-403F-4AF-4AFE-B2B3-60D135AA56E1 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:43:00 -0400 Why Mānuka isn't the only healing honey from New Zealand anymore

俄克拉荷马州的研究人员使用技术来打击初级保健中的酒精使用障碍根据疾病控制与预防中心的数据，美国七分之一的成年人将在其一生中患有药物使用障碍。俄克拉荷马大学医学院教职员工布兰迪·芬克（Brandi Fink）博士正在与初级保健诊所和医疗保健系统合作，以识别患有酒精饮用障碍的人并在问题恶化之前进行干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/oklahoma-researcher-uses-technology-technology-to-combat-alcohol-cohol-cohol-use-disorder-disorder-rimary-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/oklahoma-researcher-uses-technology-technology-to-combat-alcohol-cohol-use-disorder-disorder-rimary-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e408ff3-eea1-4957-96fc-d7cb2afa4fb6 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:34:26 -0400 Oklahoma researcher uses technology to combat alcohol use disorder in primary care

斯坦福大学的研究揭示了葡萄糖在细胞分化中的惊人作用在斯坦福医学研究中，糖葡萄糖几乎是每个活细胞中的主要能源，它也被揭示出来，它也是组织分化的主要调节剂 - 干细胞引起了构成人体所有组织的专用细胞的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/stanford-study-reveals-glucoses-sorrprising-role--in-cell-cell-differentiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/Stanford-Study-reveals-glucoses-sorrprising-role-in-cell-cell-cell-differentiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b451403-8819-4971-b645-645-6EDCC576A8A8 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:11:37 -0400 Stanford study reveals glucose's surprising role in cell differentiation
多模式成像揭示了与自闭症谱系障碍相关的复杂大脑改变自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）是日益增长的全球关注点，影响美国约2.8％的儿童和中国0.7％。 ASD的特征是社会互动，沟通困难和重复行为的挑战，使得早期诊断对于改善结果至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/multi-modal-imaging-imaging-imaging-imaging-reveals-complex-brain-alterterations-antertation-anter-sassipation-with-autism-spectrum-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/multi-modal-imaging-imaging-imaging-imaging-reveals-complex-brain-alterterations-antertation-sassipation-sassiped-autiss-pectrum-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= ed4f776f-f4cc-42E7-994B-551E1C533FB1 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:08:23 -0400 Multi-modal imaging reveals complex brain alterations associated with autism spectrum disorder
